Plot: Documentary on the Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middle-class Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.
Title: Capturing the Friedmans
Actors: Arnold Friedman, Elaine Friedman, David Friedman, Seth Friedman
tomatoConsensus: A haunting depiction of a disintegrating family, and a powerful argument on the elusiveness of truth.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 12 nominations.
